alert.note: Alert for Klamath Basin (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued September 16 at 7:33PM PDT until September 17 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM PDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Low temperatures of 33 to 36 degrees resulting in frost formation. * WHERE...In California, Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties. In Oregon, Klamath Basin. This includes the cities of Chiloquin, Midland, Bonanza, Tulelake, Dorris and Macdoel as well as outlying areas of Klamath Falls. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Sensitive outdoor vegetation could be killed if left uncovered. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
